posts.post_content:
The following card is for sale.  Price include shipping.  Payment via PP F&F only please.  I'll take it takes precedent over ongoing negotiations.  Email or PM with questions or interest.  Thanks, Mike



T213-2 Frank Chance Portrait - New York American - $95

[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/for%20sale/IMG_5669_zps42znxp7p.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/for%20sale/IMG_5670_zpskzdakgmn.jpg[/IMG]
This is a tough card. This is the only T213-2 Chance of the 4 that I don't have. If the buyer wants to flip for double let me know. Thanks, Rob.
Sorry, Mike, I read it wrong...I'll take it...Rob...

Rob, I sent you a PM. thanks
Mike
